Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the financing of the design, acquisition, construction, improvement and installation of East River Esplanade
Summary: Provides for the financing of the design, acquisition, construction, improvement and installation of East River Esplanade.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to financing the design, acquisition, construction, improvement and installation of East River Esplanade
